data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_001
data.value: Oh,[pause=30] a visitor?

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_002
data.value: Welcome to my little corner of the garden.[pause=30]\nYou may call me {0}.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_003
data.value: Would you like to join me for a picnic?

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_004
data.value: You must be a master of secrets if you've managed to find this place.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_005
data.value: Are you part of an exploration team?

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_006
data.value: Ah,[pause=20] {0}. \u266A[pause=0]\n It's a pleasure to meet you.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_007
data.value: I was a part of a team before...[pause=0]\n An entire guild, to be exact.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_008
data.value: It was a wonderful group with an incredible leader.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_009
data.value: Together,[pause=0] we befriended many allies,[pause=0] and aided in countless rescues.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_010
data.value: It still fills my heart with gratitude to remember everything we achieved.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_011
data.value: This island was the base of all our operations.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_012
data.value: Every guild member had a place here, yet no one knew everything about it.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_013
data.value: Filled with secrets,[pause=0] like this very grove.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_014
data.value: But one day,[pause=20] our Guildmaster simply disappeared...

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_015
data.value: Thank you for joining me today.[pause=0] I am grateful of your company.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_016
data.value: Besides the Guildmaster,[pause=0] you're the first one to find me in this place.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_017
data.value: So...[pause=0] allow me to join you,[pause=0] and keep your guild company!

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_018
data.value: We can look for the other secrets that the old guild left behind...[pause=20] together!

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_019
data.value: For old time's sake,[pause=0] let's keep this place between ourselves.

data.name: Expo_Cutscene_Line_020
data.value: It'll be our little secret. \u266A
